meta.title: Server Colocation - Interconnecx
meta.description: Server colocation starting at $50/mo. 1U, 2U, 4U and full cabinet options with {{network.bandwidth}} unmetered bandwidth in Detroit and Kansas City data centers.
meta.keywords: colocation, server colocation, data center colocation, rack space

hero.title: Server Colocation
hero.subtitle: House your hardware in our secure data centers. Professional colocation services with unmetered bandwidth, redundant power, and 24/7 access in Tier 3 facilities.
